document_data.mainbody:
Murtil Dragonsbane was the King of Bloodstone in the mid-to-late 15 century DR, and the last of the Dragonsbane dynasty.
He likely ruled from the assassination of Brianne Dragonsbane in the  until the ,Murtil is stated to have died 22 years prior to the events of Hero, which is understood to take place in 1487 DR. when he died as a childless bachelor. and indeed Murtil had been killed by Yarins favorite hitman, Rafer Ingot.
Murtils reign saw the beginning of the end of the unified Kingdom of Bloodstone when the Warlock Knights of Vaasa rebelled in the .
